title: DeepFashion Fine-Grained Fashion Classification
description: Large-scale fashion dataset with attribute prediction, consumer-to-shop matching, and landmark detection (Liu et al., CVPR 2016). Annotate clothing with 1000 categories and 50 attributes.
citation:
